name: klaus
text: JUST like old times!

name: 2kings
text: old school!

name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ImitationCrab, AndrewofDOOM, UntilYouAreSoNude, ishuta, TheSheezie, madnes, lamboyster, littlecat, Sakana, riotdejaneiro, sevenarts, dizneedave, BPMead, Pseudochron, baabaa, GMM, bug, cryptfiend85, Howard, Endquote, Sargasm, atticusonline, LordPretzel, HolyQ, DrSkradley, Baryonyx, luckypyjamas, makkuwata, willt, lk, fmercury, aesop_punk, Magb, Fcannon, mountain, nutmeg, genocidefish, eRiUukFJk, prowle4763, littlefatdog, yingkaixing, dropkickpikachu, ibetso, havenless, gkiyo, Rakadin, Ubermensch, joamiq, Pigs)

name: mira
text: he probably does not even realize that it is a sound effect, and thinks it is caused by the camera in the phone.

name: choosebro
text: He probably makes the shutter sound with his mouth, just to be extra old school.

name: untilyouaresonude
text: Yeah, I guess it's reasonable to expect sense out of this stuffed animal-robot-cat comic here. I guess that's fine to do.

name: saint
text:
18 lames and counting.
I wonder who holds the high score.

name: stuart
text:
Asherdan. Cumulatively.

Unless something's been going on in the zerg rush that is current comic comments.

name: wharfrat
text: ;;tear;;

name: geysershitdick
text: what were the other two traumas?

name: littlefatdog
text: unrequited crushes and bee stings

name: audhumla
text: the former is also an adulthood traume

name: fuckalgebra
text: I can't find that anywhere, where'd that come from?

name: saru
text:
My first unrequited crush was actually sort of my door-way into growing up.
And I think he just sort of said his own, like what he remembers as the three big traumas in his childhood.

name: dumase
text: circumstances

name: shutup_shutup
text: This comment greatly illustrates the previous strip's sentiment, I feel.

name: professorhazard
text: I was going to guess one of them was getting shat on by birds, but that is because birds seem to think that if they shit on my head enough they'll win a free iPod or something.

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by NeoNaoNeo, BPMead, Art-Vader)

name: professorhazard
text: I think this was the basis for the Genesis/arcade game in which M.J.'s dancing caused perfect invincibility/death to his foes.

name: soticoto
text: So true, though I never did understand where the extra Michael Jacksons 2 through 4 came from.

name: hamann
text: Mitosis; It's disgusting.

name: riazm
text: Beef did believe what Ray just stepped in.

name: rogergs
text:
My first Achewood.

I didn't know what all the fuss was about at the time.

name: disaster
text:
where did ray get that paper and marker pen?

thats what i want to know

name: professorhazard
text: Perhaps more importantly, how did he manipulate the aforementioned while holding his phone?

name: epicurus
text: Good attention to scale by Onstad - notice the size of the dog turd relative to Ray's foot.

name: cailetshadow
text: This is why Roast Beef ("you could see a rainbow turning out badly!") Kazenzakis needs Ray Smuckles. Because Ray Smuckles can see stepping in dogshit as an awesome throwback to Old Times.

name: fosters
text: ...whereas Beef will just freak the hell out and fall into a coma.

name: nigelchaos
text: And Ray *kept* his foot in the dog crap long enough to call Roast Beef and then take a picture. *that* is dedication.

name: hendetta
text: Two consecutive strips that deal with Old Times and things that are Old School.

name: bungdeetle
text: I used to step in dog crap all the time but now I always seem to barely miss it! JUST LIKE OLD TIMES!

name: rowboat
text: Ray is humming hell of ditties.

name: ham_shoes
text: Ray is a good-timer; the Jack Johnson of the internet

name: rowboat
text:
For Ray's sake, I hope like hell that mean this Jack Johnson:
[IMGS OFF]
and not this one:
[IMGS OFF]

name: ham_shoes
text: Yes.  Miles Davis' Jack Johnson.

name: rowboat
text: Whew!

name: heccibiggs
text: God, I entirely hate that second Jack Johnson.

name: rowboat
text: I think I've only heard one song of his, but even that was enough to make me want to see a boxing match between him and the first Jack Johnson. I would just watch the hell out of that.

name: farqussus
text: I have nothing but monumental disdain for his abhorrent countenance and his insipid mewlings that failed to warrant an EP let alone four albums.

name: fattypneumonia
text:
[IMGS OFF]
"I say your three cent titanium tax goes too far."

[IMGS OFF]
"And I say your three cent titanium tax doesn't go too far enough."

name: fineoakstructure
text:
Jack Johnson first-round bust from the LA Kings?

[IMGS OFF]

name: farqussus
text: I hope he hasn't ruined his Birkenstocks

name: poodlelucy
text: if ray wore sandals, something such as birks would be the last ones i would expect. but for the record, i thought they were birks too.

name: dasuta
text: Ray has hell of goofy leg in that photo.

name: gormster
text: he's a cat

name: wittyname
text: That is a weird leg for a cat to have.

name: ishuta
text: roast beef immediately knows what ray has stepped in

name: direhaggis
text: Either that Incan Medallion is working overtime or Ray is seriously digging the Old Times lately.

name: heccibiggs
text: I very much enjoy the perspective used to show the giant arm one often encounters when taking pictures of oneself. You know what I mean. MySpace is like full of giant arms like that. Exhibit A .

name: whoper
text:
So hey, I was at the GOF signing today.

[IMGS OFF]

name: atticusonline
text: who's the asian chick holding the sign?

name: tekende
text: Pretty sure that's a dude. Personally I'm more interested in the blonde girl with the blue jacket.

name: atticusonline
text: She is 10 kinds of not blonde!

name: tekende
text: Yeah, you're right. I first saw this on my computer at work and I think she looked more blonde on that monitor.

name: fineoakstructure
text:
What, are you no longer interested tekende, now that she's not necessarily blonde?

Who do you think you are, putting on such airs!

name: tekende
text: Oh, I am still interested. Possibly more so.

name: belgand
text: Actually, looking at her more closely I think she's the kind of blonde where she used to be blonder, but as she ages her hair starts turning darker. That is exactly what it looks like. So, in a way you're both right, but in another, more accurate way, I'm the only one who is right.

name: aperson
text:
Whoa whoa whoa. Who is this sexy piece of ass??

[IMGS OFF]

name: greenkoolayd
text:
'just like od times'
'old school
someone is feeling kind of old, i think...

name: heccibiggs
text: Old, old, old. What's with all this old imagery? Did you just see something old?

name: replication
text: A doo-da doo-da doo-da doo!

name: icecube
text: Ray drew a regular-style letter E

name: jackhuman
text: The first time I read this strip, I had my media player going. The song that came on: Skinny Puppy - Dogshit. Not even joking.

name: tekende
text: Chubby for Skinny Puppy. That band is extremely tight.

name: alilsneaky
text: I wonder where the pencil and the piece of paper came from, his thong doesn't exactly have room for pockets.
